entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
